title: Brody Brocken and his Epic Bike Trek
description: Be brave, be curious, and be ready as you join Brody Brocken and his transforming bicycle on a global adventure to eight British and European countries and then home again to the United States of America. His stuffed monkey is sure to please kids of all ages as he comes to life on the adventure, from becoming a Spanish matador to an Irish parade juggler or even an Italian opera singer! The bike has a few surprises as well as it turns into a plane, a hot air balloon, and even a sailing ship! On every page, you will be anticipating where Brody Brocken goes next. Enjoy the ride!
author: Debra Dickson
